Peter W. Higgs.affiliation_institution: University of Edinburgh, Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Peter W. Higgs.prize_reasearch: for the theoretical discovery of a mechanism that contributes to our understanding of the origin of mass of subatomic particles, and which recently was confirmed through the discovery of the predicted fundamental particle, by the ATLAS and CMS experiments at CERN's Large Hadron Collider

Karl Manne Georg Siegbahn.prize_reasearch: for his discoveries and research in the field of X-ray spectroscopy

Jerome I. Friedman.affiliation_institution: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), Cambridge, MA, USA

Walter Houser Brattain.affiliation_institution: Bell Telephone Laboratories, Murray Hill, NJ, USA

Max von Laue.prize_reasearch: for his discovery of the diffraction of X-rays by crystals

Simon van der Meer.prize_reasearch: for their decisive contributions to the large project, which led to the discovery of the field particles W and Z, communicators of weak interaction

Wolfgang Ketterle.affiliation_institution: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), Cambridge, MA, USA
